Neji uses his Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms, but only eight to sixteen times and sends the opponent flying with his palms. Hinata then attacks with her Eight Trigrams Stream Palm Wave, but the last two hit and the [[chakra]] wave and Neji finish with a strike of concentrated chakra in his fingers.

[[es:Ocho Trigramas Sesenta y Cuatro Palmas Espirituales]]
[[pl:Eight Trigrams Spirit Sixty-Four Palms]]
